subject: Compliments to you ,
body:
Compliments to you ,
My name is Alhaji Musa Isa , I am a Financial Consultant in Africa.I
represents a Politician . He has a pool of funds for partnership
Investments. Please contact me with your whatsapp number if you want
to be a beneficiary of these joint investment opportunities in your
country.
Regards,
Musa Isa

subject: Re:   Compliments to you ,
body:
Hello Musa Isa,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about this joint investment opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What kind of investment is it, and what are the potential returns?

Also, could you clarify who the politician is that you represent? It would be helpful to know more about their background and track record.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Dear Daniel ,


Thank you for your email .Because of my busy schedule I would like you
to  please
send your full names , mobile number to my colleague Mr Kenneth. He will
brief you with more  detailing of this  transaction .


His email : kennethchabal@avalacapitals.com

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Dear Daniel,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in sharing more information with me. However, before I proceed, could you please provide me with some additional details? What exactly is the nature of the information you would like to share? It would be helpful to have a brief overview so that I can better understand what this is about.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Dear Daniel ,

Direct your questions to Mr Kenneth he would be in the best position to
answer your questions.

Donâ€™t forget to forward me all responses from him for reference purposes.
Regards
Alhaji Musa Isa

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Dear Alhaji Musa Isa,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your assistance in directing me to Mr. Kenneth. I would be happy to reach out to him with my questions.

Could you please provide me with Mr. Kenneth's contact information? I want to make sure I reach out to the correct person.

Also, could you let me know what kind of information Mr. Kenneth specializes in? This will help me frame my questions appropriately.

Thank you again for your help, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:

His email : kennethchabal@avalacapitals.com


Feel free to ask him whatever questions relating to this proposal


Thank you

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:

Before I reach out to him, could you please provide me with some more details about the nature of this proposal? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding before proceeding.

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:

This project is all about you and what you can invest money on .

You have to talk about your willingness to work with a particular amount
for your projects

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:

Thank you for reaching out. I'm happy to help answer any questions or provide information you may need. Please go ahead and ask your question, and I'll do my best to assist you.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body: I guess you didn't reach out to Kenneth

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Hello there! I'm sorry, but I don't believe we've met before. How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Dear Daniel ,

This fund is deposited in a security company for security purposes.The
total amount in store is $20,000.000.00 USD.

I  contacted you because I need your assistance to invest these funds in a
lucrative business venture of your choice.
For this project you will get 50% for yourself and your team while I get
the same for my team.

In order to get these funds approved and assigned to you for the investment
purpose you are expected to pay for the legal service fee involved for this
transaction to be spelt in your name.

The service fee includes attorney fee, documents fee and the storage fee of
the money which is packaged in a consignment box.

These fees have been calculated to an estimated amount of $50,000USD ..

If you can pay these fees then you can come to meet us so we have this
transaction concluded

Thank you

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Hello! That sounds like an interesting opportunity. Can you provide more details about the business venture you have in mind for investing these funds? What kind of returns can be expected from this investment?

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
We would prefer to invest in hotels , real estates , Agriculture etc

As for the returns 20% return on investment

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
That's great to hear! Investing in hotels and real estate can be a lucrative venture. Can you tell me more about the potential returns on investment you are expecting from these types of properties?

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Dear Daniel ,

Like I said before the total amount in store is $20,000.000.00 USD.

For this project you will get 50%  of $20,000.000.00 USD for yourself and
your team while I get the same for my team.

So there is no point working with return on investment annually

In order to get these funds approved and assigned to you for the investment
purpose you are expected to pay for the legal service fee involved for this
transaction to be spelt in your name.

The service fee includes attorney fee, documents fee and the storage fee of
the money which is packaged in a consignment box.

These fees have been calculated to an estimated amount of $50,000USD ..

If you can pay these fees then you will have 50%  of $20,000.000.00 USD.

Thank you

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Can you provide more details about the legal service fee and how it is typically processed? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before moving forward.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Dear Daniel ,

Thank you once again  for your swift response. The legal documents for the
project would be processed by an attorney and taken to the court for
notarization .

There are other back up documents that would also be procured from the
government agencies which would back up documents from the attorneys office.

I hope with these explanations we can proceed .It's been from one question
to another .

Please tell me about yourself ,where you are from and your plans for the
money just in case you get 50% of the funds after the successful
transaction.

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Hello! That sounds like a thorough process for the legal documents. I'm curious, what kind of project is this for? As for myself, I prefer to keep personal information private. Can you share more details about how the funds will be used once they are successfully obtained?

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Dear Daniel ,

Thank you once more. If funds are successfully obtained you are taking 50%
out of $20.000.000.00 USD .

You can do with that $10,000.000.00 USD whatever you choose to do with it.

As soon as this operation is successful you send me my share and take yours
.

I have got my own personal plans for my own share .

Lets say 50% is $10,000.000.00 USD  that's yours same as mine too.

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Hello! That sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about how the funds will be obtained and what the operation entails? I'm curious to learn more about it.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Daneil ,

In order to get these funds approved and assigned to you for our investment
purpose  you are expected to pay for the legal service fee involved for
this operations

The service fee includes attorney fee, documents fee and the storage fee of
the money which  has been  packaged as valuable assets.

These fees have been calculated to an estimated amount of $50,000USD ..

If you can pay these fees then this transaction would kickstart for
approval and the funds would be released to you within 3 working days.

Thank you

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Dear Daniel ,


The documents do not have a fixed price, i have been given the estimated
amount that should secure all the  documents which i have mentioned that
with $50,000 .00 USD the documents and all expenses would be taken care of
within the process for funds to be released and transferred to your given
bank account.


Below is the list of documents that would be procured in your favor by the
attorney.


1. AFFIDAVIT OF CLAIM, SWORN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE


2. PROBATE CERTIFICATE FROM THE PROBATE DIVISION OF JUSTICE.


3. CERTIFICATE OF LEGALITY FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE.


These are other CERTIFICATES that would be procured .


i)  ANTI MONEY LAUNDERING CERTIFICATE


ii) ANTI DRUG CERTIFICATE


iii) ANTI TERRORIST  CERTIFICATE

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Hello Daniel,

Thank you for sharing this information about the documents required for the process. Could you please provide more details on how these documents are related to the funds being released to my bank account? I want to make sure I understand the process clearly.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Compliments to you ,
body:
Dear Daniel ,


The  AFFIDAVIT OF CLAIM is also known as a beneficiary document .This would
approve you to be the beneficiary to the project funds.


The PROBATE CERTIFICATE FROM THE PROBATE DIVISION OF JUSTICE. This
certificate helps you get the total amount  fur your investment


The CERTIFICATE OF LEGALITY FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE ; This
guarantees that the funds has no link with any criminality .So having this
certificate acquits you from any illegal charge.


These are other CERTIFICATES that would be procured .


i)  ANTI MONEY LAUNDERING CERTIFICATE.This certificate acquits you from any
money laundering accusation.


ii) ANTI DRUG CERTIFICATE This certificate is to proof that the funds has
not been accrued from the sales of hard drugs


iii) ANTI TERRORIST  CERTIFICATE;  This certificate is for who to know that
these funds are not in any link  with terriorism


So in conclusion onces these documents are procured there will be no
hindrance to letting you have a successful transfer of your funds.
Regards

body:
